fields.original_string: private static final String LOCK_SCRIPT = "return redis.call('SET', KEYS[1], ARGV[1], 'PX', tonumber(ARGV[2]), 'NX') and true or false";
fields.declarator: LOCK_SCRIPT = "return redis.call('SET', KEYS[1], ARGV[1], 'PX', tonumber(ARGV[2]), 'NX') and true or false"

fields.original_string: private static final String LOCK_RELEASE_SCRIPT = "return redis.call('GET', KEYS[1]) == ARGV[1] and (redis.call('DEL', KEYS[1]) == 1) or false";
fields.declarator: LOCK_RELEASE_SCRIPT = "return redis.call('GET', KEYS[1]) == ARGV[1] and (redis.call('DEL', KEYS[1]) == 1) or false"

fields.original_string:
private static final String LOCK_REFRESH_SCRIPT = "if redis.call('GET', KEYS[1]) == ARGV[1] then\n" +
    "    redis.call('PEXPIRE', KEYS[1], tonumber(ARGV[2]))\n" +
    "    return true\n" +
    "end\n" +
    "return false";
fields.declarator:
LOCK_REFRESH_SCRIPT = "if redis.call('GET', KEYS[1]) == ARGV[1] then\n" +
    "    redis.call('PEXPIRE', KEYS[1], tonumber(ARGV[2]))\n" +
    "    return true\n" +
    "end\n" +
    "return false"

fields.original_string: private final RedisScript<Boolean> lockScript = new DefaultRedisScript<>(LOCK_SCRIPT, Boolean.class);
private final RedisScript<Boolean> lockReleaseScript = new DefaultRedisScript<>(LOCK_RELEASE_SCRIPT, Boolean.class);
private final RedisScript<Boolean> lockRefreshScript = new DefaultRedisScript<>(LOCK_REFRESH_SCRIPT, Boolean.class);
